summary: Adds a new Dungeon near Riverwood !
descriptionHtml:
HEY ! This is my first mod created with the Creation Kit. I tested the whole Dungeon all day long but, if there are any bugs I may have missed, then just write a comment.

For those people, who are complaining about the short description, here is the long version :D

Zehzts Tomb is a mod which adds a new Dungeon to the world of Skyrim (Category-> Dungeons - New). The entrance is near Riverwood, the same location which is used in the Bethesda Tutorials. When I stared to work on my Dungeon I tried to place it somewhere else, but searching for a good location is really hard when your CK welcomes you with a bunch of Errors after loading a new Exterior-Cell :D
At this time there is no quest which leads you to the dungeon, but i think i will add this in a future update.

Spoiler:
The Dungeon itself consists out of:
- Small rooms, filled with weak Draugrs and a lot of traps 
- Boss-room, which is guarded by a Dragonpriest (no unique Mask)

Tipp: Look for the secret Pull-Bar in the Boss-room

---Installation---
-Download the file
-Just put the .esp File in the Skyrim/Data folder
-Enjoy

---Deinstallation---
Remove the .esp File
author: Zehzt
